title: Windows 7 Ultimate SP1-U x64 integrated .NET Framework 4.5, Visu
description:
The problem for adding .NET Framework 4.5 into installation of windows 7 is he can't integrate by dism, so the only way is using setupcomplete.cmd or using Audit Mode. So that, i chose Audit Mode for best choice:)

This OS is contain Ultimate Edition only. i don't add other edition like Professional, Home Premium, etc, except Ultimate only.

This OS is pre-activated using Windows Loader 2.2.1 By Daz

Source:
X17-59465.iso ; Windows 7 Ultimate SP1-U x64 by Digital Media Refresh.

Step by step for install runtime softwares that i've done with it are:
1) i shrink some space drive D into new drive become Drive E for new installation
2) install OS in Drive E.
3) press Ctrl + Shift + F3 when installation ask for create Username and Password, then the OS will enter the Desktop using Audit Mode, and then click cancell. 
4) then i install .NET Framework 4.5, DirectX June 2010, Visual C++ Redist, then install KB2533552 that can't integrated offline using Dism except install using sysprep or normal windows.
5) Restart PC, back to the sysprep again (press Ctrl + Shift + F3, click cancell),
cleaning drive C by using clean manager, after that click sysprep inside C:WindowsSystem32sysprepsysprep ; chose Generalize and Reboot, then restart to normal Windows in Drive C.
6) prepare for imaging with imageX, capture Drive E into new wim using imageX.
7) after capture, export that wim to new wim, then mount using dism for add-driver, copy pre-activate stuff into Scripts folder, then unmount and commit, then export image again! export to the fresh wim, then make iso using oscdimg.

So, i've installed: 
.NET Framework 4.5 RTM without update
DirectX Redist June 2010
Visual C++ Redist 2005 SP1 MFC Security Update x86 x64
Visual C++ Redist 2008 SP1 MFC Security Update x86 x64
Visual C++ Redist 2010 SP1 x86 x64
Visual C++ Redist 2012 11.0.50727.1 RTM x86 x64
update KB2533552

Drivers that i added using dism are:
AMD HDC
AMD AHCI controller driver
AMD SATA Driver
AMD USB Filter SB8xx
Asmedia USB3 Driver
Realtek LAN Driver
Realtek HD Audio Driver HDXCR driver for PC
SMBus AMD

Thanks all.
Seed and Enjoy.
